words.defineEn: of the number 100; the number of years in a century
words.defineVi: của số 100; số năm trong một thế kỷ

examples: Their last album sold millions.
Her last book sold millions of copies.
Millions of people followed the trial on TV.
The disease wiped out 40 million rabbits at a stroke.
Her work has given pleasure to millions of readers.

words.defineEn: one of the two equal parts of something conveyed using percentages
words.defineVi: một trong hai phần bằng nhau của một cái gì đó được chuyển tải bằng tỷ lệ phần trăm

words.defineEn: referring to the number 84; that is the number of legs on eight crabs plus four
words.defineVi: tham khảo con số 84; đó là số chân của tám con cua cộng với bốn

examples: The discovery of gold brought thousands of people to the Transvaal.
Cancer kills thousands of people every year.
A cure for lung cancer would save thousands of lives each year.
Government investment has brought thousands of new jobs to the area.
That one mistake left him thousands of pounds out of pocket.
words.defineEn: the number 1000; the number of meters in one kilometer
words.defineVi: số 1000; số mét trong một km

examples: The Dutch team have dropped to fifth place.
He felt more and more like a fifth wheel at the office.
I just wanted to feel like part of the family instead of a fifth wheel.
Villa have punched above their weight all season and it will be a remarkable achievement if they finish fifth.
The pitcher was doing well for the first four innings, then the wheels fell off in the fifth.
words.defineEn: coming or happening just after the fourth person or thing
words.defineVi: đến hoặc xảy ra ngay sau người thứ tư hoặc điều

examples: The storekeeper changed my dollar bill for four quarters.
I have zero dollars in my wallet.
She has seventy dollars in her wallet.
You can afford a dollar for a good cause.
She looks a million dollars in her elegant evening gown and flawless makeup.
words.defineEn: the unit of money in the US, Canada, Australia and several other countries, equal to 100 cents
words.defineVi: đơn vị tiền ở Hoa Kỳ, Canada, Úc và một số quốc gia khác, bằng 100 xu

words.defineEn: the number 75; the number of legs on seven crabs plus five
words.defineVi: con số 75; số chân của bảy con cua cộng với năm

examples: Nearly one-third of all bones came from porpoises.
Nearly one-third of them are younger than 18.
Perhaps one-third of slave marriages in states like Virginia were broken up by sale.
Over one-third of couples disagreed on the amount of their household’s assets.
Somehow this makes him two-thirds god and one-third man?
words.defineEn: one part of something that has been divided into three equal parts
words.defineVi: một phần của một cái gì đó đã được chia thành ba phần bằng nhau

words.defineEn: two parts of something that has been divided into three equal parts
words.defineVi: hai phần của một cái gì đó đã được chia thành ba phần bằng nhau

examples: The compass needle always points north.
The problem has now reached crisis point.
I take your point.
No point in spoiling the ship for a ha'porth of tar
The line cuts the circle at two points.
words.defineEn: an extremely small mark that is circular in shape
words.defineVi: một dấu cực nhỏ có hình tròn
